name: Defender of the Forest
description:
This Game was created for The Mash Up game Jam 2022

Themes: 

Genre: Adventure 

Theme: Protect 

Setting: Forest 

Item: Bat 

Controls: 

Both controller and Keyboard and mouse Input are supported. 

WASD OR ARROW KEYS to move

Instructions: 

Explore around the map Locating and activating the totems whilst destroying the corruption which threatens the Forest!

This is the Game Jam Version of this game Created for Mash up Game Jam 2022 #MUGJ2022
